name: Yek
description: The Yek is a small fiend characterized by its chaotic evil nature. It has a solid combination of offensive capabilities and strategic abilities. Notable for its ability to form swarms and adapt to combat situations.
memorable: Yeks are dangerous fiends that thrive in groups, embodying chaotic evil with their cunning tactics and unique Devouring Swarm ability.
goals: Yeks typically aim to disrupt and weaken their opponents through swarm tactics and exploiting vulnerabilities.
relations: Yeks often accompany other chaotic fiends and work effectively in packs to overwhelm enemies.
environment: Yeks are usually found in dark, chaotic locations that align with their fiendish nature.
strengths: Possess immunities to poison and resistance to cold, fire, and lightning damage, enhancing their survivability in combat.
weaknesses: Low intelligence limits strategic options in combat.
attacks: Yek can make a multiattack consisting of a bite and claw, dealing significant piercing and slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Devouring Swarm ability allows the Yek to reduce a creature's Constitution score if attached by three or more Yeks.
senses: Yek possesses darkvision to see in darkness up to 120 feet and can communicate telepathically within the same range.
skills: Proficient in Stealth and Perception, making it effective for ambushes and scouting.
additional_information: Ability to attach to enemies and gain advantage on future attacks
Advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects
Highly effective when working in groups due to Pack Tactics
